title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.13 - Compulsory facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 13.13 - Compulsory facilities

State Regulations

An insurer, agent or broker selling insurance pursuant to a mass merchandising plan shall, with respect to any employees or members who apply for, but are denied insurance under such plan, offer to such persons the services provided by a broker in the placement of insurance through the automobile insurance plan or the New York Property Insurance Underwriting Association. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
13.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
